Title: THE PICK, PRESENTED BY DRAFTKINGS SPORTSBOOK:

Title: REBECCA MARINO ENDS VENUS WILLIAMSâ€™ CITI OPEN COMEBACK IN TITANIC THREE-SETTER
Content: The Canadian rallied from a set down, and then 4-1 down in the third, to score a full-circle victory over the former world No. 1.

Title: JANNIK SINNER CLAIMS THE 'FUTURE BOWL' IN UMAG OVER CARLOS ALCARAZ
Content: Carlos Alcaraz sprinted to his right and threw his racquet out in a desperate attempt to stab the ball back over the net.
